subject: Run local code review
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Run local code review with /plan-local-code-review on the changes in this branch compared to main.

**Skills to Invoke:** `/plan:local-code-review`

**Verification:** Review completes and feedback is captured

learnings: Local code review found 1 major issue: Jest config .ts extensions not removed (10 template + 2 root files). 3 minor issues: duplicate include (acceptable), JSDoc preambles, plan file. 3 informational notes.
